Description: Specifies [additional command line options](https://docs.gitea.com/administration/command-line) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care

Additional [configuration settings](https://docs.gitea.com/administration/config-cheat-sheet) can be set in 'custom/conf/app.ini' to override server defaults that are not otherwise set by AMP as startup parameters
Sets the server version to install. If "Specific version" is selected, the version must be set under Specific Server Version Number. Update the server after changing this setting

Sets the [version number](https://dl.gitea.com/gitea/) for a specific Gitea server version to install, if "Specific version" is selected under Server Version. Update the server after changing this setting
